data.name: Townhouse 27
data.description:
Located in the charming old part of Belgrade, Townhouse 27 stands for the only authentic boutique hotel, an urban miracle in a city that is surrounded by rivers. This quiet oasis,

gives guests a chance to be completely detached from the life of the over busy era and its fast pace, in an artistic atmosphere that is riddled with specific designer luxury.

All the modern conveniences are at your disposal, huge rooms that stand for the largest in town and, the award winning service that has been developed to the level of personal consierge.

data.name: Hotel Nevski
data.description:
Nevski Hotel is located in the heart of the city, the place where you can experience a real true spirit of Belgrade.  Just a few minute of walk from hotel, there is an ancient Skadarlija, Bohemian quarter that evokes memories of the lives of many eminent artists of Belgrade. Opposite to it, there is a famous street Strahinjica Bana, recognisable for the night life, youth and all those who are feeling this way. Of course, the location of our hotel itself is ideal for all types of visits to Belgrade as the hotel is near all the famous and well- known places of Belgrade: Kalemegdan fortress, Sport Center May 25th, National Theatre, main pedestrian zone Knez Mihaijlova Street ...

The hotel capacity is 40 accommodation units, 30 of which are suites. Each room is decorated and designed in a special, original way and provides intimate, family atmosphere. The spacious rooms and the most affordable prices combined with excellent service in very pleasant surroundings provide guests and visitors a unique experience.

All rooms are furnished in accordance with modern international standards: wireless internet connection, LCD TV, air conditioning with individual settings, a small kitchen and a mini bar, safe, including additional facilities upon request are considered as standard equipment.

Breakfast is served at the restaurant, and is included in the room rate. The hotel bar, perfect place to relax after a hard working day, is open 24 hours. Restaurant is multifunctional and suitable for all kinds of seminars, conference or celebration. Guests’ cars are safe in an underground garage with video surveillance.

data.name: Moskva
data.description: Welcome to “Moskva” Hotel, a landmark of Belgrade, one of the most important architectural gems of the Serbian capital, built in the style of the Russian secession which has been under state protection since the second half of the previous century. It was inaugurated by King Petar I Karadjordjević himself in 1908. The hotel is now completely renovated and in addition to luxurious rooms and suites, the iconic café and restaurant, it also includes a ballroom, 4 conference halls and a new spa centre. With deep respect for its over a century long tradition and value - the renovated hotel „Moskva“ meets the highest modern hospitality standards.

data.name: Life Design Hotel
data.description:
Located in the heart of Belgrade, in one of the most famous and intresting Balkanska Street, hotel LifeDESIGN 4**** have 67 rooms. Each room is modernly designed and can give you a sense of satisfaction and comfort.
If you are for breakfast, a quick lunch, coffee break between meetings or afterwork cocktail , visit us in the Privilege Restaurant.
Casual business meetings or just breaks between everyday work can make your day pleasant in hotel's Lobby bar. Chose from wide range of beverage, hot and cold drinks, gluten-free products, fruit salads and excellent desserts.
Exclusive Five Elements Spa and Beauty center has saun world with jacuzzi, Finnish sauna, bio sauna, infrared sauna, steam bath and tepidarium free of charge for all our guests. Spa center offers variety of unique massages, as well as numerous face and body treatments.
Life and Design - classy furnished rooms, ideal for all kinds of conferences, seminars and other bussines events.
Holistic center of LifeDESIGN Hotel offers best experience in direction of healthy lifestyle.
Hotel provide private garage with free parking spaces for all guests.

data.name: Smokvica Vračar + B'n'B
data.description: Bed & breakfast, world class restaurant, comfy terrace… Smokvica Vračar is all this plus a bit more. When you step into this cozy yard of Vračar, you will be surprised with the size of the flower garden and sophisticated style decoration of this restaurant. Garden is paved with bricks, tables are set under the trees which makes a colorful shade, and a place on the arc terrace will give you a nice view of the entire spacious garden. Now we ask you: Is there anything more beautiful than a light meal with a glass of wine in this cozy atmosphere? And if it gets cold, go inside and you will feel like home in Smokvica Molerova. Here you can dine next to a romantic fireplace with candles, or stay in one of the 8 unpretentiously decorated rooms located on the first floor. These specially designed guest house concept is what distinguishes Smokvica Vračar in Belgrade’s offer, because the only thing which separates you from the urban Belgrade are single, wooden stairs leading to the first floor. Sounds good, doesn’t it?

data.name: Holiday Inn
data.description:
Stay at the Holiday Inn Belgrade four stars hotel, next to the BELEXPOCENTAR Convention Centre in the heart of New Belgrade.

Daylight streams into the glass-walled Lobby at Holiday Inn Belgrade, a 15-minute drive from Nikola Tesla Airport. Check in to your spacious Guest room with complimentary high-speed Internet and unwind with a soothing massage in the hotel spa. We're conveniently located in the dynamic New Belgrade business district, 10 minutes' drive from the centre of the Serbian capital.

You can reach major companies like IBM, DaimlerChrysler and Lufthansa on foot in less than 20 minutes. If you're driving, Holiday Inn Belgrade offers complimentary parking and easy access to the E70 motorway. We're next to the BELEXPO Convention Centre and 4.5km from conferences at Belgrade Fair. Invite up to 100 guests to events in our 7 naturally lit meeting rooms, all with wireless Internet.

Work out in the hotel's Fitness Centre and treat yourself to a Turkish bath or sauna in the spa. In the charming city centre, the mighty ramparts of Belgrade Fortress offer views of the Danube and Sava rivers. Pick up quirky gifts on 19th-century Knez Mihailova Street.

Choose from pastries, fruit and cereal at Holiday Inn Belgrade's breakfast buffet. Traditional Balkan dishes are served in Singidunum Restaurant and our open-plan Lobby bar is a laid-back spot for mingling over cocktails.

data.name: Kasina
data.description:
Hotel "Kasina" is located in downtown Belgrade, across Terazijska famous fountain built during the rule of Milos Obrenovic.

Hotel "Kasina" is one of the oldest hotels in Belgrade. Built in 1856 year. The name "Kasina" is based on the Italian word for the first indicating "summer house" and "restaurant", and then, name expands when in Florence opened the first European public casinos and other buildings elsewhere in the world are named "Casino (Kasina in Serbian)".
This tradition hotel "Kasina" is maintained until today.

data.name: Contact
data.description:
Contact is a brand  new hotel in Belgrade  rich in stylish, comfortable atmosphere, professional service and friendly staff. It is located on the border of New Belgrade and Zemun.

The hotel is designed to meet the needs of a wide range of potential clients from modern business people, tourists, to young people eager for entertainment, as well as all those who visit Belgrade for other reasons. It welcomes anyone in need of luxurious and comfortable accommodation and shelter from the big city noise.

This is a welcoming place with a familiar atmosphere, a home away from home cherishing peace and tranquility. It is perfect for those fleeing from the daily grind, from crowds, from the breakneck pace of modern life, seeking  a different, more relaxed world. The highly professional, knowledgeable and friendly staff with around-the-clock availability and services honed to the highest standards confirm the first impression: you are in the right place.

Hotel Contact has storage capacity of 10 rooms and 3 luxury suites as well as a parking space reserved for its guests. There is also the option of organising transfer to the airport. Contact caffe & restaurant known for its excellent food and hangouts is open all day for hotel visitors.

The hotel is 15 kilometers away from the international airport Nikola Tesla and 6 kilometers from the city center. Within the hotel's walking distance there are Gardoš fortresses, Madlenianum opera-theatre, Grand Casino, Danube Quay – the core of the capital's nightlife, and nearby are the Belgrade Arena, shopping centres Ušće and Delta City, Belgrade Fair and Kalemegdan.

data.name: Beograd
data.description:
Hotel "Beograd" je oaza mira i udobnosti smeštena usred uzavrele energije i burnog života centra Beograda, koji svakodnevno poseti hiljade ljudi i predstavlja idealnu bazu kako poslovnim ljudima, tako i onima koji putuju iz uživanja.

Lokacija hotela je izuzetna. Nalazi se u centru grada, u neposrednoj blizini železničke i autobuske stanice, sa odličnim vezama sa svim delovima grada. Nadomak je Knez Mihailove ulice, šetališta u kome možete osetiti sav šarm Beograda, nadomak mnogobrojnih pozorišta, muzeja i bioskopa, kao i Skadarlije - stare boemske četvrti. Takođe se nalazi u neposrednoj blizini Skupštine grada Beograda, Privredne Komore Srbije, Privredne Komore Beograda, brojnih ministarstava i ostalih institucija relevantnih za poslovne ljude.

Hotel raspoleže sa 15 dvokrevetnih, 20 jednokrevetnih i 15 soba sa francuskim ležajem, kao i 4 apartmana. Sve sobe su savremeno opremljene, sa kupatilom, telefonom, TV i svim ostalim komforom potrebnim gostima. Ukupan kapacitet hotela je 54 sobe (68 ležaja), što pruža mogućnost za smeštaj manjih grupa koje bi poslovno ili turistički posetili glavni grad Republike Srbije. U okviru hotela Beograd nalazi se restoran kapaciteta 120 mesta, koji radi tokom cele godine.

Poseban, odeljeni deo restorana veoma je prikladan za priređivanje poslovnih ručkova i večera, koktela i privatnih svečanosti. U prijatnom i mirnom ambijentu restorana serviraju se sve vrste specijaliteta domaće i internacionalne kuhinje, kao i kvalitetna pića. Takođe je gostima hotela na raspolaganju banket sala, u kojoj mogu organizovati poslovne sastanke, konferencije i prezentacije. Hotel je otvoren cele godine.

data.name: Eden Luxury Suites
data.description:
6 sun drenched luxury suites located in the most prestigious part of Belgrade; Knez Mihajlova Street built in 1870 year. 
These stylish appartments boasts with lobby friendly reception, room service and best possible location. Being in the core of events and night life you will equally enjoy complete tranquility while resting. 
We stand out from others because the essence of Belgrade is it soul – just window view away.
Staying in the heart of the center you are just few steps away from leading venues like National theatre, best Belgrade restaurants and clubs, most significant cultural and historical complex of the Serbian capital Kalemegdan fortress. Belgrade Fortress is certainly the crown and the heart of Belgrade. It stands on a top of a ridge overlooking the Sava and Danube rivers and it spreads across 53 hectares and has four areas - Great and Small Kalemegdan and Upper and Lower town. 
Due to beautiful panoramic view of the rivers, Turks called it "contemplation hill ".

data.name: Smokvica Jovanova + B'n'B
data.description: Smokvica u Gospodar Jovanovoj vam osim ukusa za pamćenje i ambijenta za uživanje pruža priliku da se nađete u legendarnoj istorijskoj kući. Za arhitekturu ovog istorijskog zdanja zaslužna je prva žena arhitekta u Srbiji, Jelisaveta Načić. Ova kuća knjižara Marka Markovića iz 1904. nedavno je proglašena za spomenik kulture, a sada je u njoj naša Smokvica, koja vam pruža priliku za uživanje u posebnoj gastronomskoj kulturi, kao i sveukupnoj kulturi življenja. Rad na preuređenju jednog od simbola gradskog života na Dunavskoj padini trajao je četiri godine, budući da se vodilo računa o tome da svaki važan arhitektonski detalj bude sačuvan. Drvo smokve koje se nalazilo u dvorištu presađeno je pet metara dalje, i svakodnevno je negovano sa velikom pažnjom. Za enterijer koji nas podseća na scenografiju nekog umetničkog filma zaslužna je Sanja Popov Radović čiji koncept i dizajn eneterijera odlikuje svaku od Smokvica. Prvi izbor koji će vam teško pasti je na kom od dva nivoa da provedete svoje vreme, budući da u svakom kutku ove Smokvice možete da zamislite sebe, dok ćete možda pomisliti i to da nikada nije toliko hladno da se ne nađete u bašti, koja izgleda kao umirujuća dnevna soba, samo bez krova. Pored neobičnih gastronomskih specijaliteta koji vam u svakoj Smokvici nude ne samo čulni užitak već i svojevrsno iskustvo ukusa, Smokvica u Jovanovoj ima i pizza peć na drva (hrast i bukva), a prave se od napuljskog brašna sa malo kvasca i bez šećera. Ukoliko osetite da vam se ne odlazi odavde, budite bez brige, Smokvica u Jovanovoj raspolaže sa 6 dvokrevetnih soba.

data.name: Square Nine
data.description:
The concept of the hotel was born from the owner’s desire to be part of Belgrade’s renovation, impressing a luxurious, but more familiar character to the city, where in the last two decades only big hotels from international chains, not committed with the city’s identity came to sight.

The interior design applies materials such as stone, bronze mirrors and wood claddings, both light and dark colored, which results in a very cozy ambient and the most elegant atmosphere.

data.name: Metropol Palace
data.description:
Capture magical moments and explore Belgrade, one of Europe’s most vibrant cities, from the distinctly cosmopolitan Metropol Palace. Originally designed as the venue for a global conference in 1961, the hotel today blends the era’s international architectural and interior style with contemporary luxury.

Metropol Palace’s truly magnificent central setting next to the grand Tašmajdan park invites you to explore Belgrade's many monuments, palaces, theatres and museums rich with indigenous and international cultural gems, all within a short stroll from the hotel.

data.description:

Excellent service, comfort, atmosphere suited for work and leisure, will make hotel Helvetia to be your choice when visiting Belgrade.

data.name: Hotel Aleksandar Palas
data.description:
Aleksandar Palas Hote was named after the great Serbian King Aleksandar Obrenovic. The idea to name after kinky came from the very position of the hotel. It is situated between Kralja Petra I (King Peter the 1 dynasty), and Cara Lazara (Tsar Lazar Nemanjic dynasty) streets, so the third Serbian dynasty Obrenovic, got its place in the name of Aleksandar Palas Hotel.
The building in witch hotel is located was built in 1887 and dates from the 19th century, and so we were the neighboring buildings, thus creating a beautiful and harmonious architectural complex. This central part of the city is soon to become a pedestrian zone according to the master urban layout; therefore with the traffic relocated, hotel surroundings shall gain a whole new quality.

data.name: Srbija
data.description:
Hotel Srbija Garni is a four star, modernly designed hotel, opened in February 2012. Located in the center of the city, at the point where the old city meets new urban part, it enables you to be within walking distance of historical sights such as the Knez Mihailova street, the Kalemegdan park, Bohemian quarter Skadarlija, and modern business-shopping centers at the same time. Just in a few minutes you can find yourself walking near two beautiful rivers or visit famous capital’s theaters, museums, state institutions, clubs, restaurants and cafes. A good connection with the airport, bus and train stations, convention centers, and the Belgrade Fair makes the location even more attractive.
The hotel has a capacity of 39 luxury rooms, deluxe rooms and suites. All rooms are equipped in accordance with modern international standards and have a wireless internet connection, LCD TV, air condition, mini bar, safe deposit box, including additional facilities upon request. At the hotel is located BG caffeteria open until 24 pm, the perfect place to relax after along day. The hotel also has a conference room, which is essential for business people and for all kinds of training and seminars. Vehicles of hotel guests are safe in the underground garage, which is secured by video surveillance.
Attractive location, exquisite and functional interiors, impeccable service and the best prices, come together to create an experience that is both grand and intimate and will make you choose our hotel as your home away from home.
You are invited to enjoy the comfort, privacy and trendy elegance of a luxury boutique hotels world-class.

data.name: Nova City

et in the Palilula district in Belgrade, 4.3 km from St. Sava Temple, Nova City Hotel Signature Collection features free WiFi access and free private parking. Guests can enjoy the on-site restaurant.

data.name: Beograd Art
data.description:
Welcome to Belgrade Art Hotel.

We hope that you will spend pleasant moments here and bring only the best memories from Belgrade!

On behalf of our employees we wish you an enjoyable stay in Serbia and we thank you for choosing Belgrade Art Hotel. Our hotel is located in the centre of Belgrade, in Knez Mihailova Street, in the pedestrian zone of the city. We have the privilege of being the only hotel in the capital’s main street, and our doors are located only a dozen meters from Knez Mihailova’s landmark that puts Belgrade on the map. Your stay at Belgrade Art Hotel will give you the opportunity to explore the most attractive parts of the city by foot, and the absence of vehicles guarantees a peaceful night.

By choosing Belgrade Art Hotel you have chosen a small family establishment away from the crowd, high buildings, uniformity and rigid rules of large hotel chains. In our hotel you will soon meet all employees and other guests, and also give us a chance to get to know you and accommodate you to the fullest. Belgrade Art Hotel belongs to the Todorovic family, a family known in the fashion industry. We have transferred our desire to understand the needs and wants of the modern man from the fashion to the hospitality industry. As in any good clothing store, our guests will find anything at their fingertips, the choices are plentiful and the staff accommodating.

Here you will find art, a concept stated in our hotel’s name. It is the art of design, the art of gratifying our guests, and just a touch of modern art. All this is weaved into the details in our hotel. Our facilities present the works of young artists from Serbia – paintings and sculptures that you can buy and carry with you as a memento. You will also see the results of work of the designer house Berni from Florence, which devised every detail of Belgrade Art Hotel.

We invite you to give into the magic of high class service and experience Belgrade Art Hotel as a place of comfort and rest, a place for meetings and pleasant times with your friends and business partners, a place for conferences, business meetings and company events. Our restaurant overlooking Knez Mihailova Street is open until late hours with weekend performances by young and talented musicians. Be sure to recommend Avgustin Waffle & Ice Bar located on the ground floor to all Belgrade’s guests. And before you come to stay at Belgrade Art Hotel again, we suggest a trip to Vrnjacka banja, and our Aleksandar hotel, for a truly Serbian spa experience.

data.name: Balkan Orient Express
data.description:
Hotel Balkan is in the center of Belgrade overlooking Terazije Square and a fountain from 1860. It provides well-equipped rooms with cable TV and free Wi-Fi.

All the rooms are air-conditioned and come with a work desk and a safe. Each room features a private bathroom with either a bathtub or a shower, as well as a hairdryer and a bathrobe. Some rooms offer a river view.

The hotel’s restaurant and lounge, The Orient Express, serves meals in an elegant atmosphere. Thanks to its central location, the Balkan Hotel is very close to all the cultural and entertainment venues in the city, as well as to the town hall and the Chamber of Commerce.

The Republic Square is just under a quarter of a mile away. The shopping street of Kneza Mihaila is a quarter mile from the hotel and the Kalemegdan Fortress and the Belgrade Zoo can be reached with a 15-minute walk.

Transportation to and from the airport can be arranged upon request and for a fee. The multilingual, committed staff can happily assist with any guest requests. Free private parking is available on site.

data.name: Zira
data.description:
"Zira Hotel Belgrade" was opened in May 2008th in the heart of Old Belgrade. By design, Zira is a business hotel that offers its guests 127 superior and deluxe rooms, of superior design and quality.

For guests and visitors, there is an international restaurant with terrace, three modernly equipped conference rooms and free use of a fully equipped fitness center and sauna, secure indoor parking, free internet access throughout the hotel and free international phone calls to land-lines.

It was built at the crossroads of two major city streets, Roosevelt and Cvijiceva and is part of Zira complex. It is located near the Universities and parks, just off Boulevard and only a fifteen minute walk from the Republic Square.

The hotel has a great location and access to both the city center and other parts of the city.

data.name: Palas
data.description:
The Palace Hotel Beograd is located in the very heart of Belgrade, in close vicinity to the main pedestrian zone of Knez Mihailova Street and conveniently located in a quiet part of town near the historical and cultural attractions, city and state institutions, museums, theatres, cinemas, numerous shopping centres and Skadarlija – the old Bohemian quarter. The hotel is designed to offer relaxation to those on business as well those travelling for pleasure.

Palace Hotel Beograd has been rated as a 4 star hotel.
It boasts 86 accommodation units on six floors, 33 of which are single rooms, 38 double rooms, and 15 suites. There are also rooms designed for non-smokers.

All rooms are equipped with LCD TV, mini bar, air conditioning, telephone, wireless internet connection, spacious bathroom, room service, laundry and ironing.
The hotel has two restaurants, a bar, Internet cafe, banquet hall, Salon, hair salon, exchange office, and garage.

If you wish to feel the spirit of old Belgrade, experience the city’s history, and at the same time feel pleasant and comfortable, then our hotel is the right choice for you.

data.name: Šumadija
data.description: Hotel Šumadija is a modern, four-star business hotel awarded for quality. It's ideally located both for business and leisure travelers and is perfect for corporate events. The hotel is placed in a quite and attractive area, very close to New Belgrade business area and the Belgrade Fair (2km). Moreover, Ada Ciganlija lake and the pleasure-ground Košutnjak (ideal for sport and recreation) are nearby.

data.name: Hotel In
data.description:
Welcome to IN hotel, the place where the guests return with the smile!

The location where the hotel is located, allows us to meet absolutely all your requirements and interests.

Hotel’s accommodation capacities are of 187 units spaced on 7 floors.

On the VIII floor of the hotel, there are INfinity bar and terrace, offering a unique view of the New and Old Belgrade. Infinity bar is the ideal place for organizing cocktail parties, celebrations, various family and professional gatherings.

For business meetings, trainings, seminars and other types of gatherings, there are 5 conference rooms equipped with the latest video and audio equipment and a capacity of 10 to 100 people.

Complimentary (free of charge) wireless Internet access is available in all parts of the hotel.

For moments of relaxation and enjoyment, hotel guests have access to 2 restaurants, 2 bars and a Fitness Center with sauna, hydro-massage tub, relax part and the offer of different types of massages.

In the lobby, next to the currency exchange offices and ATMs, there is a business center with two computers, which is open and available 24 hours for all hotel guests.

The modern complex of 10,000 square meters, offers impeccable service, highly professional staff and friendly ambient, both for work and for the rest and relaxation.

In the name of the hotel speaks 10 years of existence, the excellent feedback rating and great number of regular guests who come again and suggest IN hotel to their families, friends and business associates.

Be a part of our story, as we are working for you with a smile on our face!

data.name: Belgrade City Hotel
data.description:
Discover a home in Belgrade

The Belgrade City Hotel is home to 87 rooms in various categories in two buildings, that offer you four-star (main building) and three-star (annex building) comfort with warm comfortable atmospheres and modern amenities, throughout your time in Belgrade.

    Our central location is the perfect starting point for wandering throughout the city centre and taking tours around the most famous landmarks. It’s the perfect choice for city centre accommodation Belgrade.

Our Staff, always attentive but yet never intrusive, will know how to answer any request with impeccable and personallized service, which is what one should expect from the quality tradition of Serbian Hospitality.
Perfect for any occasion

On-site amenities include the Savamala restaurant & bar, cozy lounge area, meeting facilities, an airport transfer (advance notice required), parking (reservation necessary), free wireless Internet access throughout the property. Our aim is to ensure you have an enjoyable stay, whether it is, Business, or pleasure.

    Several categories of room are available to cater for the requirements of every kind of group, from executive singles up to suites and entire apartments for families (also with pets) and/or groups. Rooms with a view are available upon request, as are smoking or non-smoking rooms.

If coming by car, parking can be a challenge in central Belgrade, so here at Belgrade City Hotel we are proud to have our very own secure car park in the hotel. Parking lots number is limited so previous reservation is required. For information on how to find us by road, check our Location page.
At your service

...And last but not least…complimentary smiles :) Our staff is always ready to go beyond its “every-day duties” to assist you personally and to guarantee that you are fully enjoying your days in Belgrade.

data.name: Falkensteiner
data.description:
The 4 Star Superior hotel Belgrade designed by the star architect Boris Podrecca  stands out for its futuristic facade, its welcoming atmosphere and its first class hotel facilities. 

This new city hotel is located in the vibrant business and entertainment district of Belgrade. Close to the city centre and with a great connection to the airport, the hotel offers modern design, comfort, excellent service and a high level of functionality. A perfect place to stay whether you're visiting the booming metropolis in the Balkans for business, a conference or a sightseeing trip.

data.name: Crowne Plaza
data.description: The Crowne Plaza Belgrade is ideally located in the central business district of New Belgrade. Only 13 km from the International Belgrade Airport Nikola Tesla, near two shopping malls (Delta City and Usce) and only 5 minutes drive away from the city center. This property offers 416 guest rooms, club rooms and suites designed to provide absolute comfort, highest level of service and free Wi-Fi throughout the hotel. Crowne Plaza Belgrade is the ideal venue for convention guests, as the hotel connects directly into Sava Centre, the biggest convention centre in Belgrade. Belgrade (Kombank) Arena, the largest event and sports hall is just a stroll away.With 12 distinct function rooms, a total of 1.300 sqm/ 14.000 sqft flexible meeting space, the hotel has the largest event capacity in Serbia for important corporate functions or memorable social events. 2 restaurants, lounges and bars offering delightful specialties of International or genuine Serbian cuisine, our chefs will certainly make you have unforgettable gastronomic experience. Work out in our stylish state-of-the-art gym, enjoy the biggest indoor swimming pool in the city and get pampered with some of our stimulating treatments in the Spa area.

data.name: Majdan
data.description:
Discover the newly opened, modern hotel Maydan that exudes elegance and comfort. Pleasant atmosphere with all the comforts provided by four-star hotel will not leave you indifferent.

Whether you visit Belgrade for business, pleasure or vacation, friendly hotel staff will be there to fullfile all your requirements and will make sure to provide the experience worth remembering.

We are located at the entrance to the city, 300 meters from the Belgrade-Nis highway E-75, 6 km from the city center and 8 km from Belgrade Fair.

In addition to the extraordinary comfort and a warm and relaxing atmosphere, one of the hallmarks of your stay will be a wide range of hotel services and amenities.

For a different experience, for business, for pleasure, for you and your guests!

data.name: 88 rooms
data.description:
88 concept is our vision of hospitality, the result of an inspiring work of young and creative team inspired by unrestrained spirit of Belgrade.
Driven by individuality, we turn to all of you who instead of cold luxury rather choose a warm, friendly atmosphere, and instead of strict uniformity chooseunintrusive professionalism. If your expectation from a hotel is not just a room with a city view, but a host who will introduce you to the city, you are at the right place. Concept is based on modern hospitality, on principles of MK Mountain Resort.

data.description:
Dobro došli u Hotel Hedonic. Savršena oaza mira na periferiji Beograda...

Savremena građevina, moderan dizajn. Nacionalno gostoprimstvo i elegantna, prijatna atmosfera.

Ultimativni Hedonizam. Pokrenite sva čula i uživajte.

Uživanje, Opuštanje & Romantika.

data.name: Radisson Blu Old Mill
data.description: ur hotel in Belgrade is located in Old Belgrade near the banks of the Sava River, just minutes away from New Belgrade and the train station. The Belgrade Nikola Tesla Airport (BEG) is only 16 kilometers from the hotel. Sightsee to your heart's content at the ancient Belgrade Fortress, the Royal Palace, the Kalemegdan Fortress, the Museum of African Art and the House of Flowers. The first designer hotel in the city, the Radisson Blu reflects the spirit of the 19th-century Old Mill with brick, wood and neutral finishes combined with modern decor. The unique atmosphere of the hotel was created by the prestigious, Berlin–based Graft Architects design bureau, which preserved the mill’s authentic heritage and mixed it with an industrial-chic aesthetic. The rooms display paintings by the Strauss & Hillegaart artistic society. Each of our 236 rooms boasts floor-to-ceiling windows and Free high-speed, wireless Internet. At our OMB Larder + Lounge, guests can savor authentic Serbian cuisine and beer, wine and spirits to top off the evening. Keep up with your fitness routine with an exhilarating workout at the fitness center or relax in the sauna. Our 6 meeting rooms and large conference room next to Belgrade Fair are ideal venues for weddings or business meetings. Guests can take advantage of our garage and outdoor parking lot.

data.name: Constantine the Great
data.description:
Great experiences in life don't come so often.
With us experience the great every day!

data.name: Allure Caramel Hotel by Karisma
data.description:
Allure Hotels by Karisma a chain of boutique city hotels is part of an award-winning luxury hotel collection Karisma Hotels & Resorts, which owns and manages properties in Latin America, the Caribbean and Europe. Karisma has received worldwide recognition for its creative approach to hospitality management and product innovations.

Allure Caramel Hotel by Karisma, a boutique art gallery hotel that displays the original and reproduction pieces of art that marked the art scene through the first decades of 20th Century in the region, taking you through the history of both the region, and Europe. Located in Dorcol, the oldest part of Belgrade, in a beautiful villa built in 1920’s, Allure Caramel Hotel is a unique combination of elegance, art and comfort that will make your stay unforgettable.

Walking through its premises we travel back in time and imagine extravagant galas and feasts held here which were considered one of the main gathering places for the crème of the Belgrade social circles at that time. Allure Caramel Hotel by Karisma is the third property in the luxury city hotel portfolio whose two sister hotels, Allure Bonbon Hotel and Allure Chocolat Hotel by Karisma, adorn the bustling city of Cartagena in Colombia.

The Cartagena hotels are conveniently located in the Zona Rosa sector in the colonial walled city, designated a UNESCO World Heritage Site. Allure Bonbon and Allure Chocolat feature 14 and 34 comfortable and sophisticated rooms aim to satisfy the most demanding needs. These hotels are designed for the contemporary adults, who travel constantly for business or simply search the enchantment and magic that Cartagena de Indias can offer.

data.name: Courtyard Marriot
data.description:
Explore Serbia from our Belgrade City Center hotel

The Courtyard Belgrade City Center inspires unforgettable stays in Serbia's capital city. No hotel offers a more convenient location; we're ideally situated in Republic Square, next to the National Theatre. Our contemporary hotel lobby features a business center, free W-Fi access, and a 24-hour Market. Settle in to your beautifully designed accommodations, with its ergonomic work area, plush bedding, and superb views of Belgrade and the Danube River. Enjoy a breakfast buffet here at the hotel every morning, or stop by our restaurant in the evening for delicious Mediterranean fare. We also offer a vibrant hotel bar with a wide selection of drinks; it's the perfect place to relax after a busy day in Belgrade. If you're planning a meeting here in Serbia, you can take advantage of our boardroom venue and catering services. And the very best of the city centre is right outside our hotel doorstep, from Knez Mihailova to the Kalemegdan Fortress. Plan your visit with us now at the Courtyard Belgrade City Center.

data.name: Zepter
data.description:
The first high-category apartment hotel, located in the heart of Belgrade, is a peaceful oasis of luxury and comfort, representing the Zepter mission of health. On the ground floor, there are: the reception desk, SmartLife Restaurant with a diversified and healthy menu, the snack bar, where a buffet-style breakfast is served, and the aperitive bar, with an abundant offer of drinks and Ze-presso coffee aromas. Zepter Conference Hall, situated on the mezzanine, is a multifunctional room suitable for various meetings. Joy-Me Terrace on the 2nd floor, for up to 80 persons, is ideal for open-air events. Rooms and suites are distributed from 1st to 6th floor. SmartLife Fitness center, an ideal place for maintaining physical fitness, and the library, are located on the 7th floor, as well as the imposing Horizon Terrace for open-air events, which can host up to 100 persons.

Each suite and space in this hotel offers a unique experience of the Belgrade center and, at the same time, of the oasis of health, beauty, luxury and peace.

data.name: Theater Hotel Belgrade
data.description:
With its central location in the historic center of Zemun, the Theater Hotel is situated in a cozy environment in the immediate vicinity of the main business area of Belgrade. Above all, the Danube River and the promenade is just a few minutes of walking distance, and the central Republic square of Belgrade on 5 minutes by car.

The interior is inspired by theatre – this brand new hotel is nested in a historic building under the patronage of the Heritage Institute which keeps the Stage of the former theater. That was the first and only Puppet Theater is in Belgrade. Its repertoire included performances based on the themes of classical fairy tales, myths, legends and epic poetry.

The 4 star Hotel Theater invites you to enjoy its completely new and delightful aspects. Discover its 43 fully equipped and tastefully modernized rooms.

data.name: Argo
data.description:
Argo hotel is situated in the city center. It`s location is very suitable for business travellers and for tourists as well. Our hotel will enchant you for its unique home atmosphere and very proffesional staff, who will be at your service and make you feel you want to come back.

Mattresses and pillows are carefully selected, in order to make the best quality and comfort for our guests. Hotel has soundproof insulation, which reduces the noise that is usually typical for the centre of a bustling city.

data.name: Hotel Jugoslavija
data.description:
Hotel Jugoslavija nalazi se na samoj obali Dunava sa direktnim pogledom na Veliko Ratno Ostrvo i Kalemegnadsku tvrdjavu.  Otvoren 1969. godine, arhitektonski predstavlja prepoznatljiv izraz ideoloških, estetskih i funkcionalnih planova koji su činili osnovu izgradnje socijalističkog društva Jugoslavije.

U vreme otvaranja predstavljao je najveći i najkomforniji hotel u regionu sa oko 2000 ležaja. U hotelu su boravili brojni zvaničnici i poznate ličnosti, kao što su: Ričard Nikson, Džimi Karter, kraljica Elizabeta II, Vili Brant, Tina Tarner, Nil Armstrong, Baz Oldrin i mnogi drugi.

Hotel Jugoslavija predstavlja jedan od najvećih objekata hotelsko-poslovnog kompleksa u zemlji. U sastavu kompleksa nalazi se hotel, poslovno – prodajni sadržaji, 5 restorana, fast food restoran, kongresne i restoranske sale kapacitetai do 700 mesta.

U centralnom holu kompleksa dominira jedan od najvećih kristalnih lustera na svetu težak 14 tona sa 5.000 rasvetnih mesta, koji je izradio italijanski proizvodjač rasvete Angelo Casolia.

Hotel je renoviran i ponovno otvoren decembra 2013.

Za sve goste hotela parking i Wi Fi internet su besplatni. Recepcija hotelaVam je na usluzi 24 časa.

data.name: Vozarev
data.description:
Garni hotel Vozarev *** is located in a quiet and beautiful area near the city center. Located on the edge of the municipality of Zvezdara and Vračar, in the center of many events, it is ideal choice for business people, athletes and all tourists visiting Belgrade. Garni hotel Vozarev is only 20 minutes drive away from the international airport Nikola Tesla and 10 minutes from the main bus station and Belgrade Fair. Nearby hotel are the Boulevard of King Aleksandar, Belgrade Drama Theater, Temple of St. Sava, sports centers Olimp, Vračar and Tašmajdan, as well as a number of restaurants, bars, cultural and other contents that complement the stay.

During their stay guests have at their disposal free hotel parking. Hotel is pets friendly, pets are welcome.

If you are looking for accommodation in Belgrade let garni hotel Vozarev to be your ideal choice. Our quality service and friendly staff available 24/7 will make you feel comfortable and safe. Welcome!

data.name: Hotel Slavija Garni
data.description:
Sa velikim zadovoljstvom Vam želimo dobrodošlicu u Hotel Slavija Garni. Izbor hotelskih usluga shvatamo kao izraz najvišeg poverenja u želji da vaš boravak učinimo što lepšim i prijatnijim. Dugogodišnja tradicija, proveren kvalitet i konkurentna ponuda garantuju pružanje svih hotelskih sadržaja neophodnih da vreme provedeno u Beogradu bude deo najdražih turističkih uspomena ili poslovnih uspeha.

 

Smešteni u centru Beograda, u blizini najznačajnijih objekata i uz izuzetnu saobraćajnu povezanost,Hotel Slavija Garni predstavljaju pravo mesto da uvek budete brži i bliži od drugih. Mi cenimo vaše vreme, novac i turistička interesovanja, zbog čega smo godinama razvijali ponudu sa punom posvećenošću i željom da našim gostima obezbedimo ugodan smeštaj.

 

Očekujemo Vas!
Vaš Hotel Slavija Garni

data.name: Apart Hotel K
data.description:
This new hotel is in Belgrade's vibrant business and entertainment district. Located in New Belgrade area and with a great connection to the airport, the hotel offers a modern design, comfort, excellent service and a high level of functionality.
Perfect for business travel and conferences or a sightseeing trip to this booming metropolis in the Balkans.

data.name: Holiday in express
data.description:
Welcome to the brand new hotel in Belgrade city centre: Holiday Inn Express Belgrade – City.

Perfectly located only 10 minutes’ walk from the historical city centre, with immediate access to the public transportation, you can easily reach all local attractions of Belgrade such as: Kalemegdan Park, Belgrade Fortress, Bohemian Quarter of Skadarlija and the St. Sava Basilica. If you plan to arrive to Belgrade by car, you can have access to our secured underground garage.

This beautiful and modern hotel has 123 comfortable and stylish bedrooms. Hotel guests have access to complimentary Wi-Fi throughout the hotel. Each bedroom is air-conditioned and provided with a flat screen TV with international channels and Air Play, courtesy tray with tea and coffee and personal safe. Perfect for business trips with free Wi-Fi access and included buffet breakfast, the hotel is also a great option for family vacations with rooms for two to four people.

Holiday Inn Express Belgrade has two multi-purpose meeting rooms with natural light, in total size of 97sqm, with full audio. Our meeting room can welcome your business meetings and events up to 70 persons in theatre style. You can always rely on the support of our team for finding the best option for your meeting.

At any time of the day, enjoy a drink or a snack at our Roosevelt bar. Take your chance and chill out in a cozy atmosphere of central Belgrade.

data.name: Opera
data.description:
The traditional hotel Opera invites you to discover extraordinary experiences in Belgrade. Recently restored, its grand décor, intimate interior and rooms welcome guests to enjoy unique atmosphere and remarkable Serbian tradition.

Being located in the heart of Belgrade, on walking distance from Skadarlija, the National theater and Knez Mihajlova street, the hotel offers 12 tastefully decorated rooms and suites, cafe bar, beer pub and a stylish lobby. It is is classified as one of the best small city center hotels in Belgrade.
All rooms are equipped with modern amenities including LCD, TV, air conditioning and free Wi-Fi.

data.name: Hotel Slodes
data.description:
At the beginning of the Old Košutnjak, at peaceful place, sheltered from city noise, there is hotel Slodes waiting for its guests. This facility with 3 (three) stars is opened in 2006 and to its guests offers oasis of peace, and gentle personal welcomes everybody with warm smile.

In the hotel amenities there is restaurant with warm, domestic expression. On menu there are specialties of international cuisine which you can visit every day from 10a.m. to 10p.m. Restaurant hall also can be divided for business presentations, conferences, private celebrations and intimate dinners. In front of the hotel there is beautiful summer terrace where to the guests restaurant specialties can also be served.

Working hours of the restaurant is from 7a.m. to 22p.m.

data.name: Hotel 1000 ruza
data.description: At the foot of the mountain Avala, one of the most famous symbols of Belgrade, there is a “Hotel 1000 Ruza”, surrounded by landscapes which will take your breath away. Our advantage is definitely the location, this hotel can be your oasis of peace, without traffic jams and car noise, but from the other side is still very easy and simple to get to the important parts of the city. We are very well connected with the Belgrade Fair, Square Slavija. “1000 Ruza” is also great for you if you are traveling and want to take a break, get some sleep, relax and enjoy the specialties of national cuisine.

data.name: Balkan Hotel
data.description:
Hotel Balkan Garni was opened in 2009. Currently categorized by three, it provides all the luxury and comfort of a hotel with four stars.

Offering free Wi-Fi and free private parking, Balkan Hotel Garni is a family owned hotel situated close to the Belgrade Fair in Banovo Brdo. A 24-hour transfer service from and to the airport is available against a fee.

Balkan Hotel Garni provides air-conditioned, bright and spacious rooms (some of them with floor-to-ceiling windows) with bathrobes. There are elegant blackout curtains, flat-screen cable TV sets in all rooms.

Breakfast is possible on the room terrace, and a personal driver to take you to and from a nearby national restaurant can be arranged.

There is a fitness club as well as a dental and an eye clinic on site. Ticket service, cash machine and a gift shop are also featured, while front desk can provide dry cleaning services.

Balkan Hotel Garni is awarded by a TripAdvisor Top 10 Hotels for Service - Serbia , Travellers' Choice award-winning 2015 and 2016.

This elite award goes to the top 1% of all the hotels on TripAdvisor based on the comments and opinions of millions of travelers, for following categories:

    The most popular hotels with exceptional service - Serbia
    The most popular hotels with the best prices - Serbia

Garni Hotel Balkan is 1 km from the Ada Ciganlija and Košutnjak park, Belgrade Fair is 4 km away, while Kombank Arena is at a distance of 6 km.

City centre is within 7 km, and Belgrade Airport is 20 km away.

Welcome!

data.name: Le Petit piaf
data.description:
Located in the Skadarlija street-Bohemian quarter and the heart of Belgrade, Hotel Le Petit Piaf is near the city cultural sights and also close to famous Knez Mihailova Street, Kalemedan fortress, Republic Square, and wellknown Belgrade streets with numerous cafes and night clubs. Le Petit Piaf is one of few hotels in Belgrade that is completely "family-run", owned by one family so it is no surprise that is known primarly for its staff, ready in any time to respond to all demands of the hotel guests. This makes us very happy and inspires to get better and better every day. Besides the recognizabe staff and exclusive service,something tat makes guests to constantly returning to Hotel Le Petit Piaf is a great location and excellent value for the price. Whithin the hotel is our the rastaurant named "Mali vrabac" ( www.malivrabac.rs) which offers wide range of domestic and international dishes, all prepared by one of the most famous Serbian chefs, Mr Milos Jovanovic. For hotel guests we provide a 10% discount in restaurant "Mali Vrabac".
Be our guest and find the haighest level of hospitality!

data.name: Oasis
data.description: Hotel Oasis situated in Belgrade, Serbia is a high quality 3-star hotel which has been opened in 2009. Since then it is a family run hotel with the aim to serve customers with the highest possible service and quiality.

data.name: Lav
data.description:
Garni Hotel Lav*** je izgrađen 2000.godine, sa svojim spoljašnjim izgledom i unutrašnjom atmosferom uklapa se u tradicionalnu kulturu i duh vojvođanske ravnice.



Hotel je renoviran početkom 2009.godine, sa ciljem da oplemeni i novim izgledom obogati ponudu smeštaja. Spoj tradicionalnog i savremenog stila, podređenog komforu, učiniće da vaš boravak u našem hotelu bude doživljaj koji će Vam ulepšati boravak u našem gradu.

data.name: Fortuna
data.description:
Welcome to hotel "Fortuna". A modern three-star hotel located at business center of Zemun. Hotel is located near highway routes E70 and E75, 18km from Belgrade airport and 7km from center of Zemun. Good traffic connection makes travelling to your desired destination an easy task. 

Following the global trend, we introduce a new concept of hotel business in Serbia, which includes the high European standards and quality services at an affordable price. This new and modern three star hotel, with bed & breakfast service is based on a simple concept - value for money. Stay with us and avoid any unnecessary costs.

Kind and professional staff is at your disposal providing you with high quality service, guided by international hotel standards. Our buffet breakfast time is adjusted to your needs, from 7:00 h to 11:00 h. If you have an early flight or things to do, we'll gladly prepare a lunch package for you.

We have 30 modernly furnished rooms, with a total capacity of 54 persons. Each room is equipped with cable TV, air conditioning, DD telephone, safe deposit box and a free wi-fi connection. Modern bathrooms feature a walk-in shower, while the deluxe rooms have a two-person jacuzzi as well. Every room has a mini bar, with an option of preparing hot beverages. Guests have at their disposal free parking outside the hotel, with 24 hour surveillance. 

Stay informed by reading free daily newspapers, while enjoying your espresso in the pleasant ambience of our restaurant. Free wireless internet is available in all areas of the hotel.

data.name: Hotel Orasac
data.description:
Hotel Orasac belongs to the category of city hotels with excellent service.

It offers a pleasant environment in which to relax. It is situated on the lookout, quiet part of town near the park Košutnjak, which has sports fields, swimming pools and trails for walking and recreation.

It is designed for business people and congress tourism, but will also meet the needs of tourists and others. Modern decor in warm colors creates a gentle, soothing ambience, ideal for relaxation after a busy day in Belgrade.

It is 30 minutes drive from the city center, well connected by bus lines. Nearby is Ada Ciganlija, Hippodrome, Belgrade Fair.

City center is 10 kilometers away. Bus connection is excellent-23 and 53 buses goes to the city center.

Hotel Orasac is where you come upon it and keep coming back.

Welcome to the hotel Orašac Belgrade, a place where you will feel truly hospitability and services worth remembering.

data.name: Hotel Park
data.description:
Completely renovated in 2012 Hotel captivates with its modern style, clear and clean lines and interior full of warm colors.

Hotel Park is located in the heart of the city, at the corner of the most beautiful Belgrade streets, Njegoseva and Svetozar Markovica.

Its attractive location and excellent position surrounded by greenery provides isolation from noise and offers the same key elements as the real park does - rest, relaxation and peace.

Renovated in 2012, Hotel Park proudly wears its three star by international standards and excellent quality of service of each of its segments.

122 rooms and 3 suites offer complete comfort for our guests.

Continental Restaurant is capable of complementing needs for subtle, delicate flavors and offers the best of local specialties and international cuisine. Café Parkić is an ideal place for chit - chat and a quick and tasty meal.

To those who exercise, Hotel Park presents Fitness, wellness and SPA area.

Hotels banquet halls Garden and Forest are ideal for conferences, meetings and celebrations.

Park Hotel is located near the roundabout at Slavia Square and boulevards of the old city. The main pedestrian and shopping zone, Knez Mihajlova Street is located just 15 minutes away by foot, while it takes 25 minutes to get to the Belgrade Nikola Tesla Airport by car. Access to the highway E-75 is only 2 miles away, making the hotel easily accessible to both pedestrians and for all means of transport. In the vicinity is the location of several embassies, City Council and the Assembly of Serbia, the National Bank and numerous cafes.

However, the most important element of Hotel Park is its staff and services that give guests a reason to come back and honestly recommend Hotel Park.

The new Park in the city center.

We wish you a comfortable and pleasant stay in Belgrade!

data.name: Rex
data.description:
Located in the quiet and safe Embassies and Ministries district close to the Palace of Serbia, home to the Serbian government, the 3-star Hotel Rex guarantees a comfortable stay for all of its guests, whether they are in Belgrade, financial capital of the Balkans, for business or for pleasure, attracted to the city by its well-known nightlife and its theatre scene, festivals and cultural activities.

Hotel Rex is strategically positioned with regard to Knez Mihailova Street, the beating heart of Belgrade, close to the new design district of Savamala and Beton Hala but also well connected with Belgrade Fair, the Sava Center and the Combank Arena. Add in Hotel Rex's long experience in the hotel business and its unique style, and guests can be sure of a pleasant stay in which all their needs are catered for.

data.name: Hotel Srbija
data.description:
Hotel Srbija, one of the biggest and well-known  hotels in Belgrade, was built in 1970. After the privatization in 2005, the hotel was completely renovated, so today it is distinguished for its elegance, comfort and functionality.


Hotel Srbija holds 3-star ranking and it is located in urban neighborhood Šumice in Ustanička Street, next to the beautiful park of the same name. You will get to like peaceful and pleasant environment immediately.
What makes the location even more attractive is nearby highway, which facilitates the arrival to the hotel and at the same time provides a good connection to Belgarde Fair, airport and Belgrade Arena.


As a hotel of a great capacity of 302 accomodation units, it is suitable for congress tourism, and also ready to meet the requirements of all happenings with great number of participants, including sport manifestations and preparations. The proximity of Sports center Šumice opens splendid possibilities. The hotel is also convenient for business people and transit passengers.

 

If you are looking for the great quality of service, reasonable prices,  friendly staff which will do everything to make you feel comfortable, then Hotel Srbija is a perfect choice . If you visit us once, you will surely become our regular. As a matter of fact, you will consider us as your second home in Belgrade.
Welcome!

data.name: Tulip Inn Putnik
data.description:
Tulip Inn Putnik Belgrade was built in 1972 and completely renovated in 2010.

With its refurbished 85 standard rooms and 20 suites, it offers comfortable and functional stay to business and leisure travelers.
ll the rooms and suites feature a wide range of superb amenities including working desk, telephone, radio and TV set, in-room safe, minibar, A/C and opening windows.

With daylight and modern A/V equipment conference venue is ideal for business and private events. 

Free wireless internet access is available in all areas of the hotel. 

Indulge in culinary pleasures in hotel’s restaurant and lobby bar.

Fitness and spa center – We offer at the area of 950 m2 : indoor swimming pool with whirpoolbath, sauna, gym with cardio stations, equipment for load of muscles and different types of massage.

Parking is free of charge for hotel guests.

data.name: Skala
data.description:

Ušuskan u stari zemunski ambijent, pruža idealne uslove za odmor i boravak. Petominutnom šetnjom se stiže na obalu Dunava, prelepi Zemunski kej.

Hotel ima 14 ukusno nameštenih soba i dva apartmana, sve sobe imaju direktnu telefonsku liniju, satelitski TV program, mini bar, klima uređaj i bežični internet (wireless internet).

Vreme odjave: 12 časova.

Držanje životinja nije dozvoljeno.

Rezervacije se mogu izvršiti telefonom, ili lično.

Usluge hotela Skala

Hotel ima 14 ukusno nameštenih soba i dva apartmana, sve sobe imaju direktnu telefonsku liniju, satelitski TV program, mini bar, klima uređaj i bežični internet (wireless internet).

U prijatnom ambijentu klimatizovanog restorana možete naći veliki izbor domaće i strane kuhinje. Restoran raspolaže sa 180 mesta i idealan je za održavanje svih vrsta svečanosti.

data.name: Hotel N
data.description:
According to its outstanding characteristics and recognizable image, Hotel „N“ *** belongs to a category - city business hotel of economic class. Considering hotel's location, equipment and contents, we have defined basic target groups of costumers: business guests, sports teams, tourist (transit) groups, and participants of seminars. Certainly, our doors are wide open to everyone who is interested in our services and co-operation.

Hotel „N“*** is located on the edge of the South Central City Zone, in quiet ambience typical for Voždovac, only 4-4,5km far from the City Centre.

Very close to hotel, there is sports-recreation centre “Vozdovac” on Banjica (sport hall, outdoor and indoor swimming pool, tennis courts, bowling alley), football stadiums “Red Star”, “Partizan”, “Rad”, Military-Medical Academy, Orthopedic Clinic “Banjica”, many other private clinics and ordinations, Faculty of Traffic and Transport, University of Pharmacy, and Universities of Organizational and Political Sciences.

At only 5 minutes walk from hotel, there is Banjica forest, orinthological reservation of migratory birds that is declared as natural resource and is protected by the State, and extends to 57ha. You can reach mountain Avala, famous Belgrade’s resort and well-known Avala Tower, by only 15-20 minutes ride by a car or a bus. Some other important sights of the city, that are near hotel, and are worth visiting are “Beli Dvor”, “Kuća Cveća”, Museum “25 Maj” (museum of history of Jugoslavija), St. Sava’s Temple on Vračar, etc.

From contents that HOTEL “N” *** has to offer, there are 117 comfortable rooms, 3 large suites, restaurant with national kitchen, two aperitive bars, conference center (2 halls),two semi-panoramic elevators, garden-terrace and parking ( in front of the hotel) and it is under surveillance system. We also have a big parking for buses a few minutes drive from the hotel and it is for several buses, this parking is under protection 24 hours a day.
Rooms are equipped with direct telephone line, cable TV, internet connection, hair dryer, SOS telephones and around 60 % of rooms have air condition.

From other hotel services, guests can use room service, laundry and ironing, photocopying, free internet, fax, alarm, etc.

Reception is open 24 hours a day, and staff speaks English language. In our restaurant “ATRIUM” we serve a large selection of hot and cold appetizers, specialties from the grill, cooked meals, special orders and other dishes of national and international cuisine.

We organize seminars, trainings, presentations, promotions, corporate celebrations, business lunches, cocktails, banquets, weddings, and other similar meetings, and celebrations.

We have very good conditions for pleasant and comfortable stay of individual or group guests (business people, participants of seminars, fair exhibitors, sports teams, tourist groups and similar).

data.name: Mali trim
data.description:
Hotel Trim is located in the most beautiful part of Belgrade, Kosutnjak, a park-forest spread over 40 hectares, which offers numerous sports and recreational facilities. It is located 9 km from the city centre and 26 km from the airport. Ada Ciganlija, a river island, is a close neighbour to the hotel, and is known as the "Belgrade sea", which boasts 100,000 visitors daily in the summer. In the neighbourhood is Topcider park, in the valley of the Topcider river, the most beautiful park in Belgrade, which has numerous cultural and historical significancies.

The hotel is part of the Republic Institute for Sports complex - the National training centre, where national and olympic teams prepare for competitions. The National training centre boasts four football courts for mini football, two full size grass football courts, six tennis courts, clay and hard, indoor and outdoor basketball, handball and volleyball courts, gym, cross country running track, indoor swimming pool with sauna, and an open air swimming complex wich has an Olympic sized diving pool, Olympic sized swimming pool and four smaller pools which are open to the public. The hotel has parking for 40 vehicles.

data.name: Royal
data.description: OYAL Hotel is the oldest hotel in Belgrade. It was built in 1886 under the title 'Royal', then its name was changed in 1953 in 'Spa', a 2001 returns former and current name - 'ROYAL'. Today, the hotel Royal follows the trends of modern life. We are here to justify all your expectations , to offer you the best service and make that your time spent with us is truly special. At your disposal 100 rooms (apartments, single, double ), a total of 180 beds. Within the hotel, a restaurant, coffee bar, internet cafe, exchange office. The emphasis is on simple and beautiful amenities and atmosphere. All rooms have TVs, a large number of the rooms are air-conditioned.

data.name: Bristol
data.description:
Sagrađen 1912. godine, u duhu klasicizma, kao zgrada osiguravajućeg i kreditnog društva Beogradske zadruge, po planovima arh. Nikole Nestorovića. Objekat je spomenik kulture pod zaštitom Zavoda za zaštitu spomenika grada Beograda.

Hotel „Bristol“ ** je jedan od najstarijih beogradskih hotela, svojevremeno centar mondenskog života i destinacija na glasu kako u Kraljevini Srbiji tako i u obližnjoj Austrougarskoj monarhiji. Danas predstavlja dah starog Beograda u živopisnom ambijentu Savamale, neposredno do železničke i autobuske stanice, 11 km od aerodroma, u srcu projektovane poslovno – turističke zone.

Kapaciteti

63 smeštajne jedinice – 52 sobe: 3 trokrevetne, 39 dvokrevetnih I 10 jednokrevetnih, 11 apartmana: 5 manjih, 3 veća, 2 luks i 1 tzv. zlatni (“Rokfelerov”) apartman (sve sobe imaju telefon i priključak kablovske TV sa 60 kanala), recepciju sa telefonskom centralom, aperitiv – bar, dva restorana nacionalne kuhinje sa ukupno 250 mesta, pivnicu sa 40 mesta i malim salonom sa 55 mesta, poslastičarnicu, perionicu veša koja radi za potrebe hotela, ostalih objekata VU “Dedinje” kao i za treća lica.

data.name: Nacional
data.description: Hotel Nacional se nalazi na ulazu u Beograd iz pravaca Zagreb – Beograd – Niš i Subotica – Beograd – Niš. Udaljen je osam kilometara od centra grada i deset kilometara od aerodroma “Nikola Tesla” Beograd. U vreme održavanja sajamskih manifestacija najbrži i najkraći put do sajma vodi upravo od Hotela Nacional. U blizini hotela se nalazi Međunarodni carinski terminal, kao i veliki broj sportskih terena. Hotel je okružen šumom i zelenilom. Pogodan je za sportske ekipe, tranzitne goste, studente kao i sve ostale goste.

data.name: Radmilovac
data.description:
AUTUMN 1989, A YOUNG COUPLE INDULGED THEIR PASSION FOR HOSPITALITY BY SETTING UP A HOTEL AND RESTAURANT ON THE OUTSKIRTS OF BELGRADE INSPIRED BY THE CHARMS OF THE SURROUNDING VINEYARD AND ORCHARDS OF THE 2 HECTARE ESTATE.
 
Thus came about Radmilovac, the essential meeting place for food connoisseurs.

data.name: Hotel Prag
data.description:
Hotel Prag is situated in the very heart of Belgrade. The Hotel was officially opened in 1929 and is one of the oldest hotels in Belgrade with its long tradition. The Hotel was built in several stages, in 1929, 1936 and in 1978. The beauty of the construction itself, characteristic for modern architecture of Europe of the XX century, classified it as one of the facilities (objects) under the protection of Institute for protection of cultural monuments of the city of Belgrade. The very first owner of the hotel was a Czech, and hence the name of the hotel, Prag!

Even after it was completely reconstructed, Hotel Prag in Belgrade kept its traditional hospitality, warmth and cordiality, specific for this area. The spirit of old, Bohemian Belgrade, present in the Hotel Prag, will bring you back to the glorious epoch of our capital.

Since the hotel is situated in the very centre of Belgrade, one can easily reach the most significant tourist attractions, monuments, institutions, nightspots and shopping centres by walking. 
The hotel was built according to the project of the architect Mr. Djuro Borosic, in a formerly very well-known Commercial Street in the centre of Belgrade. It was exposed in both the first salon of architecture in 1929 and exhibition of Yugoslavian modern architecture in 1939, as a truly splendid deco style piece of art. Hotel Prag was being built in the period from May to November 1929, and it was officially opened in December 1929.

Initially, there were two entrance doors in “Prag” – the main entrance from the Street Kraljica Natalija and the other one from Balkanska Street (on the angular façade), leading to the tavern. The main entrance is the only one predicted for reception of guests of the hotel and it leads directly to the lobby of the Hotel where the reception desk and the main stairway are to be found. Therefore, it is of immense importance that it is distinguished from other entrances by its construction. Thus, the Hotel’s main entrance and pillars on the stairway are constructed out of artificial marble, and the façade out of artificial stone. Later on, during 1936, the adaptation of the Hotel occurred on two occasions. At the beginning of the year, slight interior renovation was carried out and one meter attic upgrading as well, but, by the end of 1936, the extensive works on the building of the Hotel commenced. Extension of the Hotel from Balkans Street was performed and that is when the restaurant space was dislocated and extended and the third entrance was opened. Back then probably as it is the case today, this entrance led to business premises (workshop, laundry room, kitchen), which were completely separated from the Hotel’s public rooms.

When the construction was completed, the Hotel consisted of 4 floors with seven rooms on each floor, from where magnificent view extended over Sremska plain, Topcer and Avala. During the Hotel’s expansion in 1936, six more rooms were added to each floor, and at the same time, the fifth floor and partly the mansard were built as well.

According to technical documentation, Hotel “Prag” in Belgrade offered its guests accommodation solely in single rooms, which explained the fact that the object was situated in the core of the city and that its services were mostly designated for businessman. Shared toilets and one bathroom were constructed on each floor, which complied with standards of the hotel’s architecture at the time. Namely, except for the guests who stayed at the apartments, the luxury of having the private bathroom was not predicted for interwar hotels, only the number of shared sanitary facilities varied depending on the rank of the object itself.

data.name: B hotels
data.description:
B Hotel is the first economy class hotel in Serbia, located in the business area of Novi Beograd, only 5 minutes walking distance from the Belgrade business district Airport City and only 900m away from the E75 highway.  

Offering an on-site snack bar and breakfast as well as modernly designed rooms to satisfy the needs of our beloved guests. B hotel is based on a simple concept - value for money.  All the rooms have been carefully decorated and equipped with modern commodities to offer an enjoyable and comfortable stay.

Kind and professional staff is at your disposal at any time of day or night, providing you with high quality service guided by international hotel standards. 

Free parking for our guests is available in front of the hotel, as well as the underground hotel garage with 28 spots and video surveillance. Our buffet breakfast time is adjusted to your needs, from 6:30h to 10:30h. If you have an early flight or things to do, we'll gladly prepare a free coffee, croissant and fruits for you in period from 5:00h to 6:30h. Free wireless internet is available in all areas.  

Natural materials and pastel colours, which are dominant elements in our minimalistic interior design, provide a convinient stay for every guest. By choosing B design furniture, the idea of setting a B Hotels recognizable standard is accomplished.
